Articles.Content:
I mean the lander legs which can be stowed in the last stage of a rocket.

I would use the Saturn V and the standard capsule MK3

Recent I managed to enter the capsule into orbit around the Mun and then bring Kerbin

I am ready for the ultimate challenge of landing on the moon, but fordo this i need lander.

pity that there is no such thing among the default part. Maybe the producers would have added something in the next update.

I've had enough fun playing with the Apollo 8 now time for Apollo 11;)
Uhh... As far as I can tell, you're looking for an unholy hybrid of the landing legs and retractable ladders.
There are legs and ladders in the research(?) section. The one with the cogs I believe.
I believe he's expecting there to be a pre-built ladder, and hasn't grasped yet that this is the kerbal way of doing it, no specially designed crafts, just bolt it together.
